h2_title: Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist
h3_title: Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Gore-Eye Daoist is not like most bosses you’ve faced, what with the creepy fleshy thing on his back full of eyeballs. This boss has a specialty - and it’s creating blood. Lots of it. This blood can be pretty dangerous too, as he’ll be able to create pools of it all around the arena, and even poison you with it, so make sure you’re stocked on a few antimiasma pills.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist' and the sub-subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Gore-Eye Daoist is not like most bosses you’ve faced, what with the creepy fleshy thing on his back full of eyeballs. This boss has a specialty - and it’s creating blood. Lots of it. This blood can be pretty dangerous too, as he’ll be able to create pools of it all around the arena, and even poison you with it, so make sure you’re stocked on a few antimiasma pills.
